title: Video: Cai Grocott and Mike Jones shred the Welsh Valleys on Nukeproof Mega 290c
content:
Tommy Caldwell captures some fine trail riding from Welsh racers Cai Grocott and Mike Jones in his new edit, Costa del Wales. Shot during the height of summer, the guys give us a mere snapshot of the fun thatâ€™s to be had in all conditions aboard the Nukeproof Mega 290c. Edit by Caldwell Visuals Music

The post Video: Cai Grocott and Mike Jones shred the Welsh Valleys on Nukeproof Mega 290c appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
